qas.question: What type of art is being promoted by art institutions in Cyprus?
What types of places can Cypriots visit to experience art?
What year was Cyprus supposed to host the international art festival Manifesta?

context: One of the features of Cypriot art is a tendency towards figurative painting although <a0_0>conceptual art<a0_0/> is being rigorously promoted by a number of art "institutions" and most notably the Nicosia Municipal Art Centre. <a1_0>Municipal art galleries<a1_0/> exist in all the main towns and there is a large and lively commercial art scene. Cyprus was due to host the international art festival Manifesta in <a2_0>2006<a2_0/> but this was cancelled at the last minute following a dispute between the Dutch organizers of Manifesta and the Cyprus Ministry of Education and Culture over the location of some of the Manifesta events in the Turkish sector of the capital Nicosia.
